full_summary:
# Government Contract Announcement

**Contract ID:**  WS3872285868-Doc3872438900
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Publication Date:** Thursday, February 28, 2023

The **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)** is seeking to award a contract for the procurement of a **Electric Cargo Van** to **Library and Archives Canada (LAC)**.

**Bid Details:**

* **Closing Date:** Friday, March 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Start Date:** Friday, April 14, 2023 (prov[visional])
* **Contract End Date:** N/A (no end date specified)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Open-Tendering

**Trade Agreements:** The contract is subject to the **North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)** and the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

**Delivery Region:** The contract deliverables will be delivered to the **National Capital Region (NCR)**.

**Tender Requirements:**

* 1 x Electric Cargo Van
* Related items as detailed in **Annex A – Pricing and Annex B – Specifications**

**Evaluation Criteria:** The evaluation will be based on variations or combinations of the above methods.

**Contact Information:**
Murray, David (SPAC/PSPC)
david.murray@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

For more information, please visit the government tender notice site at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15551914?extsite=MTU1NTE5MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15551914?extsite=MTU1NTE5MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
